titleStmt.title: Discourse proving from scripture and reason that the life of man is not limited by any absolute decree of God. By the author of the Duty of Man, &c.
titleStmt.author: E. R.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and are to be sold by Henry Bonwicke at the Red Lion in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Identified on UMI microfilm (Early English books, 1641-1700) reel 74 as Wing (2nd ed.) A1111B (entry cancelled).
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
